title: Spotting Scams
description: Protect yourself from callers pretending to be the CRA or police.

content.title: The 'Deportation' Threat
content.text: Scammers often threaten newcomers with deportation or arrest if they don't pay 'missing fees'. Remember: The CRA and IRCC will NEVER ask for payment via gift cards, bitcoin, or e-Transfer.

quiz.question: If someone calling from the 'CRA' asks you to pay a tax debt with Amazon gift cards, what should you do?
options: Buy the cards but don't send the codes
quiz.explanation: No government agency in Canada accepts gift cards as payment. This is a common scam tactic.
